alert.note: Alert for Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 04 at 2:50PM EDT until August 04 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of eastern New York, including the following counties, Hamilton and Herkimer. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 250 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 1.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Old Forge, Inlet, Alger Island Public Campground, Big Moose, Eagle Bay, Limekiln Lake Campground, Nicks Lake Campground, Eighth Lake Campground, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Carter Station, Mountain Lodge, Woods Lake, Thendara, Russian Lake, Minnehaha and Moshier Falls. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
